Attribute.Name: colorA
Attribute.Description: Color A

Attribute.Name: colorB
Attribute.Description: Color B

Attribute.Name: invert
Attribute.Description: Invert Noise before applying Colors

Attribute.Name: vScale
Attribute.Description: Primary Scale Factor that all noises used in this procedural run through

Attribute.Name: seed
Attribute.Description: Random Offset

Attribute.Name: Threshold
Attribute.Description: Threshold of final result, the noise has a very low range so with high treshold ranges you can get really fine results

Attribute.Name: Clip
Attribute.Description: Threshold of final result, the noise has a very low range so with high treshold ranges you can get really fine results

Attribute.Name: Mid
Attribute.Description: A multiplier of the end noise, resulting in more contrast between color a and color b

Attribute.Name: clamp
Attribute.Description: Clamping of final noise before applying color a/b

Attribute.Name: octaves
Attribute.Description: Octaves of primary Noise

Attribute.Name: octaveGain
Attribute.Description: Octave Gain of primary Noise

Attribute.Name: lacunarity
Attribute.Description: Lacunarity of secondary overlay noise, set to 0 to turn it off

Attribute.Name: width
Attribute.Description: Scale of secondary Noise

Attribute.Name: widthAdd
Attribute.Description: Gain of secondary Noise

Attribute.Name: lrg_shp_iteration
Attribute.Description: Octaves of noise to offset Shapes with

Attribute.Name: lrg_shp_amp
Attribute.Description: amplitude of noise to offset Shapes with

Attribute.Name: lrg_shp_scale
Attribute.Description: Scale of noise to offset Shapes with, this will always be larger than the one of the secondary offset noise

Attribute.Name: sml_shp_iteration
Attribute.Description: Octaves of noise to offset Shapes with

Attribute.Name: sml_shp_amp
Attribute.Description: amplitude of noise to offset Shapes with

Attribute.Name: sml_shp_scale
Attribute.Description: Scale of noise to offset Shapes with, this will always be smaller than the one of the primary offset noise

Attribute.Name: uv
Attribute.Description: Runs the noise 2d uv based, use offset/scale x/y and rotate z
